text: Voistinu, v sotvorenii nebes i zemli, v smene nochi i dnya, v [sotvorenii] korablya, kotoryy plavayet po moryu s poleznymi dlya lyudey tovarami, v dozhde, kotoryy Allakh zastavil lit'sya s neba, a potom ozhivil [vlagoyu] yego issokhshuyu zemlyu i rasselil na ney vsyakikh zhivotnykh, v smene vetrov, v oblakakh, pokornykh [vole Allakha] mezhdu nebom i zemley, - vo vsem etom znameniya dlya razumnykh lyudey
